name: anaesthetize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give anaesthetic (= a substance that makes you unable to feel pain) to a person or animal: My doctor said I will not need to be anaesthetized during the procedure. Making sure the patient is fully anaesthetized before commencing the operation is immensely important. See
anaesthetist
More examplesFewer examplesThe bear was shot with a dart to anaesthetize and sedate her so she could be transported to the forest preserve.Why have you not anaesthetized the patient and cleaned her wounds?The doctor anaesthetized my eye and gave me some eye drops which are helping a lot.
